generally voted for: increasing the tax rate applied to income over £150,000

consistently voted against: charging a market rent to high earners renting a council home

voted a mixture of for and against: a more proportional system for electing MPs

consistently voted for: restricting the provision of services to private patients by the NHS
voted against: allowing terminally ill people to be given assistance to end their life
